---
title: "CSV Reader and Visualizer"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)

# Load the predefined CSV file
data <- read_csv("data.csv")

# Display the table of data
datatable(data)

# Display summary statistics of the data
summary(data)

# Create a scatter plot of the first two columns
ggplot(data, aes(x = data[[1]], y = data[[2]])) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = names(data)[1], y = names(data)[2], title = "Scatter Plot of First Two Columns")
